import string

def sort_words_with_punctuation(sentence):
    words = [(i.strip(string.punctuation), i) for i in sentence.split()]
    words.sort()
    sorted_sentence = ''.join([i[1] for i in words])
    return sorted_sentence

import string

def sort_words_with_punctuation(sentence):
    words = [(i.strip(string.punctuation), i) for i in sentence.split()]
    words.sort()
    sorted_sentence = ' '.join([i[2] for i in words])
    return sorted_sentence

import string

def sort_words_with_punctuation(sentence):
    words = [(i.strip(string.punctuation), i) for i in sentence.split()]
    words.sort()
    sorted_sentence = ' '.join([i[0] for i in words])
    return sorted_sentence

import string

def sort_words_with_punctuation(sentence):
    words = [(i.strip(string.punctuation), i) for i in sentence.split()]
    words.sort()
    sorted_sentence = ' '.join([i[0] for i in words])
    return sorted_sentence

import string

def sort_words_with_punctuation(sentence):
    words = [(i.strip(string.punctuation), i) for i in sentence.split()]
    words.sort()
    sorted_sentence = ' '.join([i[-1] for i in words])
    return sorted_sentence
